import React from 'react' import './stiilos.css' import {Form, Navbar, Container, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCheckCircle } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {db} from "" const Body = (props) => { const initialStateValues = { name: "", url: "", documento: "", ficha: "", namef: "", trimestre: "", correo:"", }; const [values, setValues] = useState(initialStateValues); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setValues({ ...values, [name]: value }); }; const getLinkById = async (id) => { const doc = await db.collection("Formulario").doc(id).get(); setValues({ ...doc.data() }); }; useEffect(() => { if (props.currentId === "") { setValues({ ...initialStateValues }); } else { getLinkById(props.currentId); } }, [props.currentId]); return (
